entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Json: consider using nested JSON_MODIFY changing individual properties rather than using common denominator #28855
  • Make more metadata and reflection helpers public so then can be used for public conventions #28854
  • Prevent EF Core from generating foreign key #28853
  • Improve ObjectRemovedFromModel exception message #28852
  • How to properly migrate column from nullable to non-nullable #28849
  • EF7 TPC Mapping Strategy generates duplicate index names for navigation properties declared in base type #28848
  • JSON: add support for partial update to update just a single scalar property, rather than entire entities #28845

Closed

  • ExecuteUpdate with cross apply produces invalid SQL #28823
    7.0.0
  • The instance of entity type cannot be tracked because another instance with the same key value for { 'ID'} is already being tracked. #28822
  • Exception: "Unable to cast object of type" in many stored procs mapping cases #28803
    7.0.0
  • When you run "dotnet ef migrations add Blogs" in command prompt, you get an error: "your startup project doesn't reference Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design." #28785
  • Collection initilization with EF Core 7 #28847
  • Map JSON values stored in database to EF properties #4021
    7.0.0-rc1
  • Very inefficient SQL generated for simple table-split query since 3.0. #28829

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Fix issue with required navigation and query filters #28858
  • Query: Avoid repeated visitation of subquery in sql translator #28857
  • Use unmapped FKs for topological order when propagating store-generated values #28851
  • Fix to #28595 - Use partial updates for JSON #28844

Merged

  • ExecuteUpdate: Correctly identify when we need to cause a subquery join #28834
    auto-merge
  • Avoid nullability warnings w/ new XUnit.Assert #28843
    auto-merge
  • Fix base parameter index calculation for sprocs #28850
    auto-merge
  • Query: Update formatting of Update command #28797
    auto-merge
  • Merge rc1 to release/7.0 #28839
